dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S248 IS: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require labeling of genetically engineered fish.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich (for himself and Ms. Murkowski) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require labeling of genetically engineered fish.

section.header: Amendment to the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act regarding genetically engineered salmon
section.text: Section 403 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (21 U.S.C. 343) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: If it contains genetically engineered fish unless the food bears a label stating that fact.
